title: 176: Zay Jones, Chad Hansen, perfect pairings and mid-round draft steals
itunes:title: 176: Zay Jones, Chad Hansen, perfect pairings and mid-round draft steals
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks give their perfect pairings for the top two picks of every team in the NFC East and NFC South. They also talk to Cal WR Chad Hansen and Eastern Carolina WR Zay Jones about their draft prep. DJ and Bucky also discuss some mid-round edge rushers to keep an eye one late in the draft and get a classic road story from Dolphins GM Chris Grier’s days as a scout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
